otherNames: CB Character: Nagai Gou World, Chibichiara: Nagai Go Sekai, Chibi World, ＣＢキャラ永井豪ワールド
synopsis: Various characters from Go Nagai works including Devil Man, Mazinger, and Violence Jack, become trapped in a parody world where they all be come super deformed. They get trapped in this mishmash, fighting each other and are trying to figure a way back to their own world.
